message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a one-time opportunity to get a great deal on a truly unique item.
I'm really interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand that $900000 is a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. However, I need to make a profit, so I can offer you the product for $1200000. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
